title: Wanted - "The Sports Americana - T206 - The Monster" by Bill Heitman

posts.post_title: Wanted - "The Sports Americana - T206 - The Monster" by Bill Heitman
posts.post_content:
I am wondering if anyone has any copies of Bill Heitman's book "The Monster" available? I am looking to acquire copies in "bulk" if possible - 20+ or so. I recall an auction offering a batch of around 200 at one time. I am not sure if the new owner is a member here but if so I would love to discuss acquiring some copies.

If anyone has clean copies of Bill's book available please feel free to pm me or email me [url]t206society@gmail.com[/url].

Thank you very much.

Derek

hey derek-
member btcarfagno has them for sale in bulk.
here is the net54 link.
[url]http://net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=227373&highlight=heitman[/url]

Thank you very much Mark. I appreciate it.

Derek
